products.name: Heinz Vegetarian Beans in Rich Tomato Sauce No Meat

extendedInfo.detail: Vegetarian Beans in rich tomato sauce.  Per 1/2 Cup: 140 calories; 0 g sat fat (0% DV); 520 mg sodium (23% DV); 12 g total sugars.  The American Heart Association recommends meal substitutes, such as beans, prepared with little fat as a method for reducing dietary fat saturated fat, and cholesterol intakes. The aha does not endorse any product, service or equipment.  A good source of dietary fiber. A cholesterol free food. See side panel for information about sodium and other nutrients.  For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products, and our Vegetarian Bean are no exception! We are the original Kosher vegetarian bean and have maintained this superior stamp of quality for over 60 years. Scan for info.  For questions or comments call: 1-800-577-2823 Monday - Friday, please have packaging available when calling.  Contains no animal products.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Water, Prepared Beans, Tomato Paste, Brown Sugar, Sugar, Salt, Modified Food Starch, Distilled White Vinegar, Mustard Seed, Spice, Onion Powder, Turmeric, Garlic Powder, Paprika.
extendedInfo.directions: Preparation Directions: Range Top: Empty contents into sauce-pan. Heat slowly, stirring occasionally. Makes three and a half servings. Microwave: Empty contents into a 1-quart casserole: cover with lid or vented plastic wrap. Microwave at high 4 to 5 minutes or until hot, stirring twice. Refrigerate unused portion.  Tasty additions to Heinz Vegetarian Beans. For a spicy flavor, add sauteed onion, green pepper, drained canned corn and a splash of Heinz barbecue sauce. Cooked rice added to beans makes a tasty main meal. Stir in sauteed onions and green pepper and season with Heinz 57 sauce.  Best if used by date on can end.
